original_text: And the angel of the Lord went further, and stood in a narrow place, where was no way to turn either to the right hand or to the left.
korean_text: 여호와의 사자가 더 나아가서 좌우로 피할 데 없는 좁은 곳에 선지라

sentences.original_text: And the angel of the Lord went further
and stood in a narrow place
where was no way to turn
either to the right hand or to the left
